thread.title: Woman finds the most Waitrose shopping list ever – with incredibly specific instructions
thread.title_full: Woman finds the most Waitrose shopping list ever – with incredibly specific instructions

author: Joshua Barrie
title: Woman finds the most Waitrose shopping list ever – with incredibly specific instructions
text:
Woman finds the most Waitrose shopping list ever – with incredibly specific instructions Only Heston prawn cocktail will do Share This list is peak Waitrose (Photo: Daily Record) Share Get money   Thank you for subscribing!   
Waitrose shoppers are an intriguing bunch. I once saw a man buying an ostrich egg in his pyjamas, for example. 
One of the supermarket's better known fans is former Prime Minister David Cameron , who in 2014 quite recklessly said that Waitrose attracts a 'better class of shopper'. 
Cameron's comments cannot really be verified. But it is undeniable that Waitrose is one of Britain's more upmarket shopping experiences. Overheard in Waitrose remains a popular source of entertainment. 
Another customer has stumbled upon an amusing discovery within the confines of peak middle class consumerism. 
Poppy Horsman was in a Norfolk Waitrose store with mum Jill when she found a lost shopping list in a trolley. It provided a wonderfully ridiculous insight into high-end shopping habits. Here's the list
